categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: The following events took place in 119 BBY.

The Living Force Campaign Guide mentions that Nerra Ziveri became the headmaster of the Almas Academy 87 years before the Invasion of Naboo, which is dated to 32 BBY by The New Essential Chronology. It can therefore Ziveri assumed charge of the academy in 119 BBY.
